overview: In 2019, the world of motorsports saw something it had rarely seen before; the two toughest endurance events in motor racing took place back-to-back: the 24h of Le Mans and the 24h of the NÃ¼rburgring. ENDURANCE is the story of the Porsche GT Team that took on this double challenge.
tagline: The Documentary about Porsche at the Two Toughest GT Races in the World.
title: ENDURANCE
